    • Method Detail

      • applySkin

        public static void applySkin​(Skin skin)
        Sets the global skin that is applied to new and existing panels.
        Parameters:
        skin - the skin to apply

      • createPanel

        public static javafx.embed.swing.JFXPanel createPanel​()
        Creates a panel that makes use of the global stylesheet.

        applySkin(Skin) must have been called before calling this method.

        Returns:
        a new JFXPanel that uses the global stylesheet

      • runAndWait

        public static void runAndWait​(javafx.embed.swing.JFXPanel panel,
                              java.lang.Runnable runnable)
        Runs code on the JavaFX Application Thread, and then updates the panel's scene so that it gets resized in the case that components have been added or removed from the panel.
        Parameters:
        panel - the panel that the Runnable operates on. This parameter may be null.
        runnable - the Runnable whose run method will be executed on the JavaFX Application Thread
